title: Hybrid Action Music Pack Vol.2
description: Collection of 13 hybrid action music tracks.
longDescription:
Did you know this pack is also included in our Ultimate Cinematic Music Bundle which include all of Epikton's tracks for better value?


 Whether demonstrating a cinematic scene from the cyberpunk future or introducing a hi-tech weapon, your music choice can make it or break it. This track is inspired by science fiction and crafted to let your audience imagine what the future feels like.

 

Potential use cases; sci-fi games, cyberpunk games, cinematic trailers, action scenes, and product commercials.

 

Ideal for passionate game developers, YouTubers, video editors, gamers who need futuristic sci-fi music


You can listen to the preview of the tracks here:


Epikton - Annihilation

Epikton - Danger Zone

Epikton - Doomsday Machine

Epikton - Down the Rabbit Hole

Epikton - Fusion Reactor

Epikton - Molecular Motion

Epikton - Rage Of The Machines

Epikton - Rock The World

Epikton - Rocket Science

Epikton - Spreading Like Wildfire

Epikton - Storming Area 51

Epikton - Weapon Innovation
